name: Nine, Ten, Dead
description:
Fate, or some mysterious force, led you to this cursed city. Now your only hope is to fight through the gathering hordes of goons, vampires and worse, and hope you survive till sunrise. Alpha 0.1 - Combat Demo

Currently you can play a few different modes from the menu, or travel around Hotel Carcosa and see what you find.

Arena

Fight endless waves of undead goons. Survive until you can't!

Dungeon

The beginnings of a rogue-lite mode. Kill all the summoners on a floor to cause the boss to appear. Kill the boss, and the elevator to the next floor will open.

Test Boss

Test your skills against the gargantuan Necromancer. He's got a beard and three eyes.
